data: {"generalSituation":"Under the persistent influence of a dry northeast monsoon, the weather will be mainly fine over Guangdong during the weekend to early next week. It will be warm during the day with a rather large temperature difference between day and night. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China on Monday night to Tuesday at first. It will be cool in the morning and at night and very dry during the day over the region in the following couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251122","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
